context: Dysentery,Stomach pain and stomach upset,Loose Motion,
review:
I have been to her many times. And she is very friendly in nature and gives time to patient and listen all the issues. 

Understands the patient problem and give correct solution.. I have been visiting Dr. Purnima from 2017. And my experience is very good..

My father's blood sugar level exceeded 200, prompting us to seek consultation with Dr. Purnima. We are extremely pleased with the experience. Dr. Purnima exhibited kindness and patiently listened to all the details before advising the treatment.

I was suffering from UTI and came to Ikshana multi-speciality.. I met doctor Purnima and all I can say is Doctor Purnima is a wonderful, kind and sweet human being first.. She made me feel so comfortable and I felt like I was talking to a close friend.. She gave good amount of time to me and patiently answered all the questions I was asking. I generally hate taking medicine and I believe in body to fight.. This generation where doctors simply prescribe tests and unnecessary medication, I must say this doctor is again different.. She asked me to wait and start antibiotics only if symptoms become worse. I rarely see doctors follow up with patients..She got in touch with me next day over the phone and checked on me.. She called and followed up again on the third day. Seriously, I was touched by the kind gesture of this doctor.. I am recovering well...
You are a blessing doctor! World will be a better place if all the doctors be like you üòä
People at front desk are helpful too!!
Thank you for the care and affection!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very cordial and moves very well with the patient, gives the right advise. Post test results she further gives consultation over phone which is very convenient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: If you are looking for one of the excellent general practitioners in Bangalore, Dr. Purnima is the one

Doctor is very friendly, listens to all the symptoms patiently and explains the diagnosis/treatment plan very well. Definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a good Physician around Vijaya Bank layout or Arakere around Bannerghatta road.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Purnima is * **** **** ****** *** ** able to solve the health issue well. She is very approachable and discusses the issue well with the patient. The true concern is with the hospital management and the reception staff. There must be an option to take walk ins also. The reception staff actively discourage patients from walk in consultation and behave in a rude and contemptuous manner. There must be a system from the hospital to take limited walk ins since appointment cannot be taken for unpredicted illness. Hospital doesn't even have a system to given this feedback and they dont consider it seriously since it's been given many times.

Doctor is very friendly and she  patiently listens to the concerns of the patient. She explained everything so nicely.
Thank you Doctor üôèüèΩ

Dr. Purnima is different than any other doctor we came across, the way she had asked my mother about concerns was like a mother talking to her kids. My felt very comfortable with Dr. Purnima. And doctor also explained the issue and treatment options very neatly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Purnima is just the kind of doctor I needed! I wanted to get my reports and some health concerns & queries addressed to take proactive measures. I had read some amazing reviews about her and went expecting it to be good, but she was still way beyond it and brilliant! She is extremely caring and warm, patiently explained her recommendations and the report diagnosis. Will always highly recommend Dr. Purnima to anyone looking for a 'good' doctor and a holistic experience. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Was a very satisfying consultation.Doctor initially ensured she gets all the details from me verbally, and then reviewed my test results, and followed it with proper explanation of possible causes, and further evaluations and medication that was needed.

review: ********* ******* *wife had severe pain lower abdomen,got the right tests done right time .2 sides hernia and gall bladder stones detected and surgery advised .Her friendliness ,active focussed listening,and making us feel absolutely at ease is a winner .really blessed to get her counsel.Most recommended.God Bless .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr Purnima for my daughter's illness. She greeted us in a friendly way and diagnosed the problem quickly. She is very soft spoken and explained the problems in a very friendly manner and in a way that we could understand. She gave generic tips for healthy well being of the family and talked to us like a family friend. We had a great experience. I highly recommend Dr Purnima !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ******* ***** ** ** ********* ****** *** * great advocate who will share best health advices after hearing , sensing your symptoms . I liked the patience she has around her patients . She will take all the time to listen and examine your issues deeply before starting a medication . I had stomach issues and was very happy with her medication and treatment .  She will go into the details before suggesting any medication . She is excellent in analysis of any health issues and great at treating the same . I always feel very positive after consulting her .
Very good Diagnosis and treatment suggested. Instant results and recovery in dengue ( 7 days). Excellent work.

Doctor did good analysis. More than anything she was et patient in listening to what I was telling. Felt safe and comfortable sharing my problem with the doctor. Yes I would highly recommend this doctor to anyone.
